text: Alessandro Martucci (16th century) was an Italian painter of the Renaissance period, active near his natal city of Capua. His son, Simio, painted quadratura and died in 1641. ==References== * Category:People from the Province of Caserta Category:16th-century Italian painters Category:Italian male painters Category:Italian Renaissance painters Category:Year of death unknown Category:Year of birth unknown
title: Alessandro Martucci
